Works perfectly fine, the fiddler program is only needed to trick the BETA into thinking that the BETA is still active. Just read the instructions.txt and follow them correctly, and you'll have a blast. It says you need to reinstall after the 3 songs, I just restart the game and it still works fine. Steam is not required, nor is a Steam account.

This is a good original game. It was developed not by a corporation but by a single independent developer. He has priced it at a reasonable $10 US.

If you support independent game developers, you can try the free demo or buy the game at http://www.audio-surf.com/ The $10 investment allows you to enjoy all aspects of this innovative game.

If you don't want to reinstall / restart the game after 3 songs, you can do this to play unlimited :

1. Open with a hex editor the file SavedConstants.cgr located in the AudioSurf\engine\Support directory.

2. Go to offset A290. Replace the byte value with FF 
3. Go to offset A291. Replace the byte value with FF
for the trick in my previous comment in order to work you should have launched and exited audiosurf 1 time after installing
